website_summaries.verdict: A versatile perch that works just as well for play and exercise as it does for rest.
pros: Coiled design encourages physical activity and helps birds improve balance
Pure cotton rope is safe and easy to grip
Wire inner can be reshaped according to cage size or owner preference
Bell adds an extra touch of fun
cons: Destructive birds might not be able to resist unraveling the rope

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Good width for a medium to large bird (ex. Amazon,hawk headed parrot, mini macaw, pionus, african grey). Easy to bend and re position. Birds being on it doesnt seem to bend it much. When the bottom isn’t attached to something, there is some swaying/bouncing. When the bottom is attached to a bar, there is very little bouncing and no swaying. Seems to withstand some chewing on pretty well. No frays quite yet and one of my birds has been using it as their chew toy as opposed to their actual toys. If you plan on connecting the top and bottom, you will need to buy/have some toy hanger clips on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: ZoE (our sun conure) LOVES it, she spend hours and hours playing on it...
customer_reviews.author: Debe

customer_reviews.title: My CAG LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My Congo African Grey LOVES this! She plays on it, sleeps on it, naps on it. ..you name it, when she goes in her cage she goes to her boing! The last one I ordered lasted about 4 months, $ well spent! Ordering her a new one today because it has started unraveling from the top (not too bad considering she is always chewing and playing at the top because I usually tie a shoe string or something dangling from the center! ) oh, and she took to it INSTANTLY when I put it in her cage :)
customer_reviews.author: April Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product for parrots and cockatiels
customer_reviews.text: This traveling perch can go with you in the car, motel and the birds never get tired of it. The perch can be molded to avoid poop accumulations. Very handy item and loved by birds.
customer_reviews.author: David Hilton

customer_reviews.title: ... parakeet or as large as a macaw would be happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my African Grey but I think any bird as small as a parakeet or as large as a macaw would be happy with this. Please remember to use only under supervision. After a little use their little feet could get tangled in the threads, which could cause strangulation.
customer_reviews.author: Sasaoakea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my birds love it. They have never had a bungee begore and they are really loving it. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Rast

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Toy Invented
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this toy? It's the greatest thing!! My Severe Macaw absolutely loves his bungee. If something ever happens to it, I know I'll have to purchase another one. It's flexible enough to make it long or short. It's easy to clean too. Just put it in a 5-gallon bucket of warm vinegar (use sparingly) water, soak, scrub, hang to dry, and you are done. It's a great exercise toy for your parrot and will keep him occupied for hours. My parrot and I love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great boing!
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey does not like to do much except talk, sit on my shoulder or fly after me. I am trying to teach him to play & experience new things so he can have more variety. He is growing used to the boing so I think it is a good addition. It also works as a great chew toy. It is very well made & even though he chews on it I think it will last him a long time. Packaging was good & the delivery was as estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Zanzara

customer_reviews.title: but he spends a great deal of time on it
customer_reviews.text: My parrot, an Alexandrine, loves this thing! I really don't know why, but he spends a great deal of time on it. I upgraded to a bigger one outside his cage and put his old smaller one inside the cage. I think it's cool because it acts like a ladder as well as a perch and you can bend it to achieve all sorts of sizes and functions.
customer_reviews.author: Nistha

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for your large bird
customer_reviews.text: I have two yellow naped Amazons and this is a winner! Sturdy, made well and fully adjustable without losing its shape. The moment I introduced this into the cage it was a favorite. I enjoy the clownish activities my birds make while playing with it. Will buy another to have on hand and this seems to be a permanent addition to the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Straight-Talk

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Attached this to my ceiling, and it drapes down to my bird stand. My bird lives on the bird stand and loves hanging out on it and the ability to walk up to the ceiling. (Birds like height). It's cleanable by soaking in the sink, and sturdy. My red Belly doesn't chew on it, but it would stand up to quite a bit of it.
customer_reviews.author: Furb

customer_reviews.title: Lasting entertainment  for my severe Mccaw
customer_reviews.text: This didnt last 2 weeks in my birds cage.he destroyed it in no time! Not durable at all.waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great, shipped quick and exactly what I expected. What I didn't expect was my Grey to rip it apart so it looks like a hanging spaghetti. I had the first one for years - same exact product. One day he started chewing away at it and within several months - it was a mess. This time around - I hung it in his cage and within a week - torn apart. Greys are too smart for their own good :)
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: My Red Bellied Parrot loves this toy! She likes to chew on these and it took her a long time to get through this!
customer_reviews.author: Diane rabener

customer_reviews.title: The colors are nice and bright and Meeko
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful and strong! I can bend this boing into whatever shape I want and it stays! The colors are nice and bright and Meeko, my Grey, loves the swivel. My one complaint is that she was able to remove the clapper from the bell within minutes! I wish it was sturdier since that was one of the biggest selling points for me. Meeko loooooves bells, but this one didn't stand up to her.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Vick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely long and very nicely manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Winding of overthreads is very tight, eliminating the possibility of birds getting their nails stuck in the covering material. Love the length of the product as the birds run up and down it like a vertical playgym and I deliberately attached smaller toys to each level to encourage them to move from level to level.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great parrot rope toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great rope bungee cord! My CAG loves it, in fact, he perches near the top when he goes in his cage to sleep. Cleaning is simple, just soak it in warm water in the tub, then all the nasty stuff rinses out completely and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: silkmommy

customer_reviews.title: The one I got from here is wonderful quality. The string overlay is super tight and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for my parrot forever. My African Greg loves these. The one I got from here is wonderful quality. The string overlay is super tight and sure stands up to tough birdie beaks. The hardwear is really nice, tough and smooth so as not cut a birdie tongue. I love the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McClintick

customer_reviews.title: Well made, a big African gray has no trouble hanging onto it.
customer_reviews.text: While another customer mentioned that it seemed too large in diameter for his bird to hold onto, I had the opposite experience. my bird is about the size of an amazon. Perhaps his was a 'Timneh' gray, which are slightly smaller, and would have smaller feet. My pionus parrot has difficulty with this size and needed the next smaller diameter toy.
customer_reviews.author: The_Nightfly

customer_reviews.title: Portable and very useful. My cockatiels like this
customer_reviews.text: Portable and very useful. My cockatiels like this. We can hang it from a chair so that they can be with us during the day. We also hang it from the outside of their cage so that they can climb it from the ground to get up higher all by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: starcat

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Bought two, both birds loved it.. They were afraid of it at first, but finally started checking it out. They nap on it. Run up and down it and hang upside down. Good quality. I like the large size for my grey. My conure likes that size as well. One of his new places to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: African Grey friendly
customer_reviews.text: African greys are slow to warm up to new toys especially one as large as this. The diameter of the rope is ideal for an African Grey's grasp and just like swings, they eventually become curious enough to give it a whirl then spend hours playing.
customer_reviews.author: Anasazi

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my cockatoos
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoos love these. Care should be taken to ensure there's no lose strands and to cut these off when present,and if allowed to get wet watch out for mold and replace as needed. A lot of fun for my birds and good for their feet. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BoMarc

customer_reviews.title: this is a great toy unfortunately my cockatoo who is a afraid of ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great toy unfortunately my cockatoo who is a afraid of most things (surprisingly not of this i keep it on the outside of her cage so she can get used to it and she walks past it no prob.) has not used it yet but im hopeful in time she will
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: my green cheek conure loves this,
customer_reviews.text: my green cheek conure loves this, we hang it from a planter hook in the ceiling and it is coiled loosely and he jumps from his cage back and forth on it and climbs up to the ceiling
customer_reviews.author: savanahsirval

customer_reviews.title: ... mom since she has two large parrots and they love it! It's so cute seeing them chill on ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this for my mom since she has two large parrots and they love it! It's so cute seeing them chill on these fabric vines, makes it look like they're in a jungle! I have to say, quality was great, shipping was great, and over-all first impression was great. Your birds will definitely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great Boing!
customer_reviews.text: My macaw loves boings,I go through several a year she loves to chew on the rope. This was well made and came quickly. I have serial different kinds of perches in her age but she spends most of her time on the boing. This was a great size as she has a large cage and I can stretch this to suit her.
customer_reviews.author: Tami B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE if have a lively green cheek. Mine are constantly climbing and hanging off of theirs - bell almost never stops ringing; a happy toy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Trelane Dante

customer_reviews.title: Spiral rope perch.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy product @ a good price. Perfect size for my small cockatoo. She likes to chew on it also. You do have to have a rather large cage for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Flynt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a conure!
customer_reviews.text: Must buy.. I actually was really impressed by the size and the thickness of the rope. I have a blue crowned conure and he loves it... Can hang on ceiling or however you like and it also stretches out in height or length depending on how u want it setup.. Highly highly recommended.. Do not waste your money at petsmart.. This is well worth is for the long term
customer_reviews.author: Luis de Angelo patino

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good size for an Eclectus. My bird loves to climb on this thing. He probably spends 50% of his day on his. He rests on it and takes naps on it too. When we switch out the toys in his cage, we always leave this one in b/c he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: pharmgirl

customer_reviews.title: my bird uses it like a perch
customer_reviews.text: my bird uses it like a perch. very satisfied with the rope itself, but the bell is very low quality and i took it off the rope and threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: gbrooks

customer_reviews.title: My eclectus loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This bungee has quickly become my eclectus parrot's favourite place to hang out! He has already destroyed the bell by removing the clapper (within 24hrs) but I think that says more about his obsession with bells than the quality of the product. As it does just have a relatively small nickel plated bell, if your parrot loves destroying bells it might be a good idea to swap it to a sturdier bell before letting your parrot loose on it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My CAGs favorite bouncy toy!
customer_reviews.text: My CAG loves to perch on the top loop and swing and bounce all over it. She also loves to hang upside-down from the bottom while bouncing and attacking the bell! Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Leesha Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is really great for Cockatiels
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for Cockatiels, or any other parrot of similar size. I would not purchase this for anything larger than a small conure. My birds love it, it's super sturdy and is holding up well to the occasional chew fest when I have forgotten to supply my birds with new shredding material. Overall I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Slayton

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love these . Hang in front of window for our bird. Great in shower too.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Happy bird, happy mama.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old Timneh African Grey Gracie loves her rope toy. Its improved her coordination and balance immensely.
customer_reviews.author: serina48906

customer_reviews.title: my citron cockatoo destroys everything. He has been working ...
customer_reviews.text: my citron cockatoo destroys everything.He has been working on this one for months, and it is still functional! And he loves it! Naturally, he had to pretend it was scary and awful for the first few days.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Kepper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made. My Goffin 'Too loves these and it is essential to her cage set up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Daily

customer_reviews.title: African Greys Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My CAG's are having a great time with this. I was actually surprised since they are sometimes afraid of new things. They took to this quickly and enjoy climbing it or just hanging on it.
customer_reviews.author: CiscoKidd

customer_reviews.title: Great length!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This rope is long. We are going to have a lot of fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: Mudcrutch

customer_reviews.title: A Great Accessory
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo absolutely loves his rope perch. Its a great accessory for any large parrot and their cage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Myke

customer_reviews.title: My Cockatoo Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo "Shasta" loves her climbing rope. She probably spends 75% of her time on it. I usually replace it 2 -3 times a year when it becomes frayed enough to catch her nails, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: It took my African Grey awhile to check it out ...
customer_reviews.text: It took my African Grey awhile to check it out. Now he is on it every day. Bell on the end not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for an African Grey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a smaller similar one for my cockatiels and they love it. They've had it for years. I decided to purchase this one for my African Grey. He destroyed it in a couple days. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Its a great quality and can withstand much of her chewing
customer_reviews.text: My military macaw loves it. Its a great quality and can withstand much of her chewing. She loves to be able to bounce. I took her a few days to get used to it but now it's her favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Our African grey thought it was big at first but ...
customer_reviews.text: Our African grey thought it was big at first but he loves it now and it proved to stay together much longer than the smaller one we had last time.
customer_reviews.author: PIZZAMAN

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bungee Rope
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was exactly as described. I have purchased three of these in the past and my Amazon loves them. He can hang, bungee jump or sleep really comfortable. The rope gives him plenty of room to climb around - thanks!
customer_reviews.author: GWOM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Greys! I go through one every 60 days (or less). Well made and my birds love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Great size for an African gray. We go through a couple ropes a year so will be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  B

customer_reviews.title: Now I have an easy place to get replacements when its time
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves these things. Now I have an easy place to get replacements when its time.
customer_reviews.author: Moke

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Bird Rope Toy
customer_reviews.text: The 96-inch size is too big for an African Grey. They can climb on it but the next size smaller would have been much better. This size is good for a Macaw or Cockatoo.
customer_reviews.author: P. Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I wanted but I can still stand on it
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: This is the best perch ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best perch ever. My parrot loves this perch and has become his favorite climbing toy and place to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: It's going to last a long time. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jamison

customer_reviews.title: ... Nape Amazon and African Grey and they are in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I have this rope on a play gym for my Yellow Nape Amazon and African Grey and they are in love with it! They hang upside down on it and travel through the middle of it. My African Grey went right for the bell, easily and quickly removing the clanger inside the bell. She is not a large parrot so it needs to be more secure and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Kuharske

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, my sons female eclectus parrot loves her rope. His wife is getting a jarden, ill have to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guntert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've got a"huge bird" and it's all over this thing
customer_reviews.author: David dececco

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. I put it into the bird cage and my bird loves sitting on it and bouncing on it as well. Great product for the price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Vocalbeast

customer_reviews.title: ... African Grey loves her swing - fast delivery - great price.
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey loves her swing - fast delivery - great price.
customer_reviews.author: HobbstheFerret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my African Grey!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality (and big) boing!... I have a 6 foot cage and This is now in the center of the cage. My parrot loves this. I will be buying another one to hang from my basement ceiling.. You can stretch it out and reshape it if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Ok but..
customer_reviews.text: The bell is rather small (conure sized at best). My African grey Size I think not. I ordered 2 and only 1 had a bell on it
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Graham

customer_reviews.title: used everyday even when traveling.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. My parrots love them. I hang a clean one while I wash and air dry the other. The hold up very well
customer_reviews.author: kathy akers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rope for my cockatoo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for a worn out rope. This one is perfect for my cockatoo. It's wide enough for her to walk on and the the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Super Bird Boing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, I buy them regularly for my parrots, they love to chew the rope and climb on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Watch your bird when playing
customer_reviews.text: With Parrots nothing lasts long, this product started falling apart before 24 hours. The cap came off causing the rope to unwind, leaving the metal rod exposed.
customer_reviews.author: TINA MORITZ

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Great product, built strong! My African Grey cannot destroy this, although, he's already pulled the bell off....but he always pulls bells off haha. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: rope perch/toy
customer_reviews.text: Great rope toy. I was happy with it the minute I saw it, just what I wanted. The question is, will it hold up under bird torture and destruction? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne lee

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Great product my eclectus love this! It is bendable so it can be changed as part of enrichment.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Crazy fun for my CAG
customer_reviews.text: My CAG loves the bouncy ropes, goes crazy bouncing up and down!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatoo ripped it up within 3 days. Must be something out there he could not destroy so quickly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia V.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice toy but unfortunately my African Grey is absolutely terrified of it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: cockatoo loves this rope
customer_reviews.text: It is a good heavy rope for the price. My rose breasted cockatoo loves to hang upside down and scream, sometimes he gets extremly loud, but he is just haveing fun!
customer_reviews.author: arlene malveaux

customer_reviews.title: Our African Grey loves this. He climbs up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our African Grey loves this. He climbs up and down and just loves to perch on it. We're on our 3rd because he loves to unravel the braid.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good price and it came right away
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. Good price and it came right away. I was well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kim scott

customer_reviews.title: remote holder
customer_reviews.text: Always losing my remotes. This holds all the remotes and my Kindle Fire fits in the center section!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

product_meta.title: Super Bird Creations SB325 Colorful Cotton Bungee Rope Bird Toy with Ringing Bell, Large Size, 9/10” x 96”
product_meta.description: Rope bungees are a great perching alternative that promotes fun, balance and exercise. Every bird needs One.
feature_bullets: For large birds – The large bungee bird toy by Super Bird Creations is the perfect size for amazons, African greys, eclectus, small cockatoos, Mini macaws and similarly sized pet birds.

Design features – The large bungee bird toy is crafted with the finest quality 100% cotton rope to provide a safe and secure footing. The bendable internal wire allows you to reshape the length and diameter of the coils.
Enrichment benefits - The bungee bird toy is designed to not only entertain but also to promote exercise and help to develop coordination and balance skills.

Relieves boredom – properly designed bird toys are more than “just toys”. Super Bird Creations parrot toys are “playthings with a purpose” that help to ward off boredom, depression, aggression and destructive behaviors in parrots by stimulating physical activity, curiosity and mental engagement.

Bird safe components & design – Recommended by avian professionals worldwide, our products are expertly designed to maximize the safety and enrichment benefits to pet parrots. Bird owners can be confident that only the finest toy components are used.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
